PROCESS BEFORE OUTPUT.																																
*&SPWIZARD: PBO FLOW LOGIC FOR TABLECONTROL 'TAB'																																
  MODULE tab_change_tc_attr.																																
*&SPWIZARD: MODULE TAB_CHANGE_COL_ATTR.																																
  LOOP AT   gt_yclxj																																
       INTO w_yclxj																																
       WITH CONTROL tab																																
       CURSOR tab-current_line.																																
    MODULE set_mode.																																
*&SPWIZARD:   MODULE TAB_CHANGE_FIELD_ATTR																																
  ENDLOOP.																																
																																
  MODULE status_9000.																																
																																
																																
PROCESS AFTER INPUT.																																
  MODULE exit_process AT EXIT-COMMAND.																																
*&SPWIZARD: PAI FLOW LOGIC FOR TABLECONTROL 'TAB'																																
  CHAIN.																																
    FIELD g_zclid MODULE get_list_ph ON REQUEST.																																
  ENDCHAIN.																																
																																
  LOOP AT gt_yclxj.																																
    CHAIN.																																
      FIELD w_yclxj-sel.																																
      FIELD w_yclxj-zstau.																																
      FIELD w_yclxj-zphcd MODULE update_phnm ON REQUEST.																																
      FIELD w_yclxj-zclid MODULE click_list_lb ON REQUEST.																																
      FIELD w_yclxj-zpric.																																
      FIELD w_yclxj-zlycs.																																
      FIELD w_yclxj-zlxfs.																																
      FIELD w_yclxj-zxjrq.																																
      FIELD w_yclxj-ernam.																																
      FIELD w_yclxj-erdat.																																
      FIELD w_yclxj-zbeiz.																																
      MODULE tab_modify ON CHAIN-REQUEST.																																
      MODULE set_change_flag ON CHAIN-REQUEST.																																
    ENDCHAIN.																																
																																
  ENDLOOP.																																
*&SPWIZARD: MODULE TAB_CHANGE_TC_ATTR.																																
*&SPWIZARD: MODULE TAB_CHANGE_COL_ATTR.																																
																																
  MODULE user_command_9000.
